src.java.com.studentsonly.grails.plugins.uiperformance
Class CacheFilter

Adds 'Expires' and 'Cache-Control' headers plus handles necessary headers when the resource is gzipped. Only applied when in prod mode and deployed in war.

author:
Burt Beckwith
